text: David Hannay (23 June 1939 â€“ 31 March 2014) was an New Zealand-Australian movie producer.Part 1 of a 3 Part Interview at Urban Cinefile He worked with Greater Union and was an independent producer from 1977.David Hannay bio at 2011 Ken G Hall Film Preservation Award accessed 25 November 2012 Hannay was born in New Zealand. Hannay died on 31 March 2014 from cancer, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian movie producers Category:Deaths from cancer Category:New Zealand movie actors Category:Television producers
